DOC.brief_summary: This is a retrospective analysis and description of the preferred diagnostic and treatment methods employed on GIST on the Region of Coquimbo from 2003 to 2008.
DOC.brief_title: Current Management of Gastrointestinal Stromal Tumors (GIST) in the Region of Coquimbo
DOC.criteria: All operated patients with GIST Positive immunohistochemistry Patients with GIST not operated Patients with GIST operated on but without immunohistochemistry
